title: OnePlus 10 Pro long-term review: An imbalanced equation [Video]
content:
In recent years, OnePlus has shifted so far away from the faux “plucky upstart” enthusiast brand, and the OnePlus 10 Pro is the biggest indicator of that. This is our long-term review of the latest OnePlus flagship.

more…

description: We have lived with the OnePlus 10 Pro for over a month to work out just where it stacks up against the best in the business.
